item.title: 特朗普计划就数字服务税对加拿大和法国征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四表示，他计划就加拿大和法国对美国科技巨头征收数字服务税一事对两国征收关税，这一直是一个长期的刺激因素。【原文：President Donald Trump on Thursday said he planned to impose tariffs on Canada and France over their digital services taxes on U.S. technology giants, which has been a long-standing irritant.】

item.title: Coinbase 公布第四季度利润因加密货币上涨而增加
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周四报告称，受美国大选后比特币和其他代币交易量增加的推动，第四季度利润大幅增长。【原文：Crypto exchange Coinbase reported a steep rise in fourth quarter profit on Thursday, driven by higher trading volumes in bitcoin and other tokens following the U.S. election.】

item.title: 广告销售强劲，Roku 季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受强劲的用户增长和强劲的广告销售推动，Roku 周四公布的第四季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Roku topped Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by robust subscriber growth and strong advertising sales.】

item.title: 飞机交付延迟导致航空租赁公司收入减少
item.description: 航空租赁公司（Air Lease Corp）周四公布的季度收入下降，原因是尽管旅游需求强劲，但租赁商仍要面对波音和空中客车公司推迟交付商用飞机的问题。【原文：Air Lease Corp on Thursday reported lower quarterly revenue as lessors wrestle with delays in taking deliveries of commercial jets from planemakers Boeing and Airbus despite strong travel demand.】

item.title: Airbnb因外汇逆风和复活节时机调整第一季度业绩预期
item.description: 度假屋租赁公司 Airbnb 周四公布，由于国际旅游需求依然强劲，该公司的季度营收有所增长，但由于艰难的同比比较和美元走强，该公司预计第一季度的增长将有所放缓。【原文：Vacation home rentals company Airbnb posted higher quarterly revenue on Thursday as international travel demand remained strong, although it forecast slower growth for the first quarter due to tough year-over-year comparisons and a stronger dollar.】

item.title: 消息人士称，淡水河谷向 GIP 出售巴西可再生能源资产的谈判已进入后期阶段
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西矿业巨头淡水河谷公司正在就向美国投资公司 Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) 出售一个可再生能源部门和一个太阳能发电厂的多数股权进行深入谈判。【原文：Brazilian mining giant Vale is in advanced talks to sell a majority stake in a renewable energy unit and a solar plant to U.S.-based investment firm Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP), two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国运输部长达菲要求与波音公司首席执行官就安全问题举行会谈
item.description: 美国交通部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周四表示，他已要求波音公司首席执行官 "尽快 "前往华盛顿特区，讨论该公司的质量和安全问题。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said on Thursday he has asked the CEO of Boeing to come to Washington, D.C., "as soon as possible" to discuss quality and safety issues at the company.】

item.title: 特朗普备忘录概述互惠关税计划
item.description: 给财政部长的备忘录【原文：MEMORANDUM FOR THE SECRETARY OF THE TREASURY】

item.title: 巴西米纳斯吉拉斯州咖啡商暂停营业
item.description: 据农民周四与当地媒体分享的一份说明称，巴西米纳斯吉拉斯州的中型咖啡商 Central do Cafe 从本周起暂时停止运营，寻求重新谈判债务。【原文：The mid-sized coffee merchant Central do Cafe in Brazil's Minas Gerais state suspended operations temporarily starting this week, seeking to renegotiate its debts, according to a note shared by farmers on Thursday and local media.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥业务部利润略有增长，但略低于预期
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部周四报告称，其第四季度净利润增长了 1.4%，达到 152 亿墨西哥比索（约合 7.29 亿美元），略低于分析师的预测，因为其一般支出跃升了约 15%。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit reported a 1.4% bump in its fourth-quarter net profit on Thursday, coming in at 15.2 billion Mexican pesos ($729 million), slightly below analysts' forecasts as its general expenses jumped some 15%.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普准备修改美国《CHIPS 法案》的条件
item.description: 两位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，白宫正在寻求重新谈判美国 CHIPS 和科学法案的拨款，并表示将推迟一些即将到来的半导体拨款。【原文：The White House is seeking to renegotiate U.S. CHIPS and Science Act awards and has signaled delays to some upcoming semiconductor disbursements, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普警告金砖国家可能面临 100% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四表示，金砖国家 "如果想玩弄美元"，可能会面临美国征收的100%关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday that BRICS nations could face 100% tariffs from the United States "if they want to play games with the dollar."】

item.title: 特朗普称台湾抢走了美国的芯片业务，他想要回来
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四表示，台湾抢走了美国的半导体芯片业务，他希望将其夺回。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday that Taiwan had taken semiconductor chip business away from the United States and that he wanted it back.】

item.title: 特朗普称 TikTok 的最后期限可以延长
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四告诉记者，他推迟 75 天执行对流行短视频应用 TikTok 的禁令的决定可能会被延长。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump told reporters on Thursday his 75-day delay in enforcing a ban on the popular short-video app TikTok could be extended.】

item.title: 阿根廷 1 月份月通胀率降至四年多来最低点
item.description: 阿根廷统计局（INDEC）周四公布的数据显示，阿根廷1月份的月通胀率放缓至2.2%，为2020年中期以来的最低水平，略低于分析师的预期。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate slowed to 2.2% in January, its lowest level since mid-2020, while landing slightly below analyst estimates, data from the INDEC statistics agency showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 加拿大轮胎公司准备在可能的贸易战中减轻潜在关税的影响
item.description: 加拿大轮胎公司（Canadian Tire）首席执行官格雷格-希克斯（Greg Hicks）周四表示，在加拿大与美国可能爆发贸易战之际，该零售商正准备减轻关税可能带来的影响。【原文：Canadian Tire CEO Greg Hicks said on Thursday that the retailer is preparing to mitigate potential impacts from tariffs amid a possible trade war between Canada and the United States.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 支持的 SailPoint 股票市场回报估值 128 亿美元
item.description: Thoma Bravo 支持的身份安全公司 SailPoint 周四在纳斯达克首次上市，其股票开盘价与发行价一致，估值为 128 亿美元。【原文：Thoma Bravo-backed identity security company SailPoint was valued at $12.8 billion, after its shares opened in line with the offer price in their Nasdaq debut on Thursday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Arm 公司获得 Meta 公司作为雄心勃勃的新芯片项目的首个客户
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，Arm 控股公司在获得 Meta Platforms 公司作为其首批客户之一后，计划于今年推出自己的芯片，这是其向其他公司授权蓝图模式的重大转变。【原文：Arm Holdings plans to launch its own chip this year after securing Meta Platforms as one of its first customers, in a major shift to its model of licensing its blueprints to other companies, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Blackstone 寻求 8 亿美元贷款，为购买纽约写字楼提供资金
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的消息人士透露，Blackstone 计划贷款约 8 亿美元，用于购买纽约市一栋 50 层办公楼的股份。【原文：Blackstone plans to take out a loan of about $800 million to finance the purchase of a stake in a 50-story office building in New York City, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度总统莫迪与亿万富翁特斯拉首席执行官马斯克举行会谈
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）周四会见了亿万富翁特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk），双方讨论了太空、移动性、技术和创新等问题。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday met billionaire Tesla CEO Elon Musk where he discussed issues including space, mobility, technology and innovation, Modi said in a post on X.】

item.title: 卡曼控股估值近 40 亿美元，股价在纽交所首次亮相即大涨
item.description: 卡曼控股公司（Karman Holdings）周四在纽约证券交易所首次上市时股价上涨 36.4%，估值近 40 亿美元，这表明在特朗普新政府执政后市场有望扩张的情况下，投资者对国防和太空公司的胃口很大。【原文：Karman Holdings was valued at nearly $4 billion after its shares rose 36.4% in NYSE debut on Thursday, signaling strong investor appetite for defense and space companies when market expansion is expected under the new Trump administration.】

item.title: 育碧公布第三季度净预订额下降 52%，符合预期目标
item.description: 法国最大的视频游戏制造商育碧（Ubisoft）周四报告称，该公司第三季度净预订额同比下降了 52%，原因是其一些重要游戏的表现不佳。【原文：France's largest video game maker Ubisoft reported on Thursday a 52% year-on-year fall in third quarter net bookings as the company has been plagued by the underperformance of some of its key titles.】

item.title: 西门子股东否决允许召开虚拟股东大会的提议
item.description: 周四，西门子董事会试图允许公司今后在没有投资者实际出席的情况下继续召开虚拟股东大会，但最终以失败告终。【原文：Siemens' board lost its attempt on Thursday to allow the company to continue to hold virtual AGMs in future without the physical presence of investors.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现消费者债务不断增加，汽车贷款也出现了一些问题
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of New York）周四表示，由于消费行业健康发展，去年最后一个季度美国人的总体债务水平略有上升，即使汽车借贷也面临一些压力迹象。【原文：Overall debt levels held by Americans rose modestly in the final quarter of last year on a healthy consumer sector, even as borrowing for automobiles faced some signs of stress, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Thursday.】

item.title: 贝索斯的蓝色起源公司将在航天和发射业务领域裁员约 10
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）的蓝色起源公司（Blue Origin）首席执行官在周四的全体员工电话会议上宣布，公司将在全公司范围内裁员 "约10%"，对太空和发射业务进行全面调整。【原文：The CEO of Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin announced in an all-hands call on Thursday company-wide layoffs of "about 10 percent" of its employees, a sweeping readjustment of its space and launch business.】

item.title: 墨西哥可能就 "墨西哥湾 "更名对谷歌提起诉讼
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周四敦促谷歌重新考虑其为美国用户将墨西哥湾更名为 "美国湾 "的决定，并表示如有必要，墨西哥可能会对谷歌提起民事诉讼。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum on Thursday urged Google to reconsider its decision to rename the Gulf of Mexico the "Gulf of America" for U.S. users, adding the country could file a civil suit against the firm if necessary.】

item.title: 在欧盟反垄断罚款后，Meta 将在 Marketplace 上显示竞争对手的广告供应商
item.description: Meta Platforms 将允许竞争对手的分类广告服务提供商在 Facebook Marketplace 上发布广告，该公司周四表示，在此之前三个月，该公司因给予自己的服务不公平优势而被欧盟处以 7.97 亿欧元（8.28 亿美元）的反垄断罚款。【原文：Meta Platforms will allow rival classified ads service providers to list their ads on Facebook Marketplace, the company said on Thursday, three months after it was hit with a 797-million-euro ($828 million) EU antitrust fine for giving its own service an unfair advantage.】

item.title: EnCharge AI 融资逾 1 亿美元，将人工智能推理芯片推向市场
item.description: EnCharge AI 初创公司周四表示，该公司在老虎环球（Tiger Global）领投的 B 轮融资中筹集了超过 1 亿美元的资金，用于向市场推出更高效、更便宜的人工智能芯片。【原文：Startup EnCharge AI raised more than $100 million in a Series B funding round led by Tiger Global to bring more efficient and less expensive AI chips to the market, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普希望今年与印度达成公平贸易协议
item.description: 特朗普政府官员在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）周四举行峰会前表示，特朗普政府希望降低美国对印度的贸易逆差，并希望在2025年与新德里达成公平的双边贸易协议。【原文：The Trump administration wants to bring down the U.S. trade deficit with India and hopes to have a fair bilateral trade deal with New Delhi in place in 2025, Trump administration officials said ahead of a summit between President Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday.】

item.title: Defiance ETF 为特斯拉和福特配对，未来还有更多对决
item.description: Defiance ETFs 周四推出了一只交易所交易基金（ETF）--Battleshares TSLA vs F ETF，这是看多创新型公司和看空传统行业同类公司的组合基金中的第一只。【原文：Defiance ETFs launched an exchange-traded fund (ETF), the Battleshares TSLA vs F ETF , on Thursday, the first of a group pairing bullish bets on innovative companies with bearish ones on their traditional industry counterparts.】
